author: wn.com
title: Why Zunera Ishaq fought for her niqab - and became an election issue
text: The whole country has been talking about her, including - and especially - â€‹Conservative leader Stephen Harper. Today Zunera Ishaq explains why she fought so hard for the right to wear her niqab at the citizenship ceremony, despite criticism from all sides. And how it feels to be at the centre of a decisive campaign issue. ...
